author: Jo' Pratt
method: Mix together all of the ingredients in a small bowl and serve straight away or store in the fridge until needed.
ingredients: 200ml/7fl oz mayonnaise,  3 tbsp capers, drained and chopped,  3 tbsp gherkins, drained and chopped,  1 small shallot, finely chopped,  squeeze of lemon juice,  3 tbsp chopped fresh parsley,  flaked sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
